directory.name: components
directory.purpose: This directory, `src\components`, houses the source code for various components of a "Todo" application, including input, individual items, lists, filters, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: TodoApp
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoApp` directory contains the source code components for a "Todo App" application within a temporary repository.

subdirectories.name: TodoFilters
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoFilters` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for filtering tasks within a "Todo" application.

subdirectories.name: TodoInput
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoInput` directory contains the source code for the input component of a "Todo" application within a temporary repository.

subdirectories.name: TodoItem
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\components\TodoItem` directory houses the source code for the individual TodoItem component within a larger application.

subdirectories.name: TodoList
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoList` directory contains the source code components for a to-do list feature within a larger software project.

subdirectories.name: TodoStats
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoStats` directory contains the source code components for a "Todo" application's statistics feature.
